email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

I hope this message finds you well.

We are pleased to offer mv SEA HORIZON for your 12,000MT steel coils shipment from Rotterdam to Houston.
Rate: USD 85/MT on CFR basis.
Laycan: 20-25 November 2023.
NYPE terms with demurrage USD 12,000/day.

Please let us know your thoughts.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Hi Julia,

Thank you for the offer. USD 85/MT seems a bit high compared to current market rates. Can you revise to USD 78/MT?

Looking forward to your response.

Regards,
Peter Wilson

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for your feedback. After discussing with the owners, we can offer a revised rate of USD 80/MT. This is our best and final offer.

Please confirm your acceptance at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Julia,

USD 80/MT is acceptable. However, we would like to extend the laycan to 22-27 November to accommodate some scheduling changes on our end. Can you confirm this adjustment?

Regards,
Peter

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Dear Peter,

We can accommodate the revised laycan of 22-27 November. Please find the recap below for your records:

Commodity: Steel Coils
Quantity: 12,000MT
Load Port: Rotterdam
Discharge Port: Houston
Incoterms: CFR
Vessel: SEA HORIZON
Freight: USD 80/MT
Laycan: 22-27 November 2023
Demurrage: USD 12,000/day

Kindly confirm your agreement.

Best regards,
Julia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Confirmed: Steel Coils - Rotterdam to Houston
email_chain.body:
Julia,

Confirmed. Please proceed with the arrangements.

Thank you,
Peter Wilson
